Search for a SAGA-GIS tool

Source: R/search-tools.R
search_tools.Rd

Search for a SAGA-GIS tool

search_tools(x, pattern)

Arguments

x

saga object

pattern

character, pattern of text to search for within the tool name

Value

a tibble containing the libraries, names and parameters of the tools that match the pattern of the search text and their host library

Examples

# \dontrun{
# initialize Rsagacmd
saga <- saga_gis()

# search for a tool
search_tools(x = saga, pattern = "terrain")
#> # A tibble: 9 × 6
#>   library            tool                 author saga_cmd parameters description

#> 5 ta_morphometry     terrain_ruggedness_… O.Con… Terrain… <chr [7]>  Terrain Ru…
#> 6 ta_morphometry     terrain_surface_tex… O.Con… Terrain… <chr [8]>  Terrain su…
#> 7 ta_morphometry     terrain_surface_con… O.Con… Terrain… <chr [10]> Terrain su…

#> 9 terrain_analysis   terrain_clustering   O.Con… Terrain… <chr [4]>  created fr…
# }
